original_subtitles.text: Welcome to today's satsang. Today we will explore the journey that truly matters in our spiritual evolution.
The journey within is the most important journey. It's about discovering who we truly are beyond the mind and body.
When we turn our attention inward, we begin to see the patterns of the mind and how they create our reality.
This understanding brings us closer to our authentic self, the witness consciousness that remains unchanged.
The practices of meditation, self-inquiry, and mindful living are the tools for this inner transformation.
Remember, the goal is not to escape life but to live it with greater awareness and compassion. Thank you.
